featured.name: I. Podium
featured.desc: Podium makes it easy to prepare for technical interviews by giving you short quizes on any subject of your choice. The is a fullstack web-app, as well as a native mobile app for android.

featured.name: II. Nkolo
featured.desc: Nkolo is an invoicing app which allows merchants to send payment links. It comes as a native android app built with Java and with a backend which combines firebase and NodeJS to collect payments.

featured.name: III. Kombi
featured.desc: Kombi is a Calendly knockoff which provides scheduling, budgetting and task management functionality. Currently available as a native mobile app for android with web services built with node and express.

featured.name: IV. Zeword
featured.desc: Zeword is a mobile offline bible application with an inbuilt note-taker. It is built as a native application for android and uses local storage to manage user data.

Library.name: Podium Web
Library.desc: Platform allows users to create short test which can be taken by users on the podium mobile app.

Library.name: Podium API
Library.desc: Restful API for managing CRUD operations for all quizes available on the podium project.

Library.name: Podium Mobile
Library.desc: Podium mobile app makes it easy to prepare for technical interviews by giving you short quizes on any subject of your choice.

Library.name: Nkolo Mobile
Library.desc: Invoicing application for small businesses to create and send payment links via sms.

Library.name: Nkolo API
Library.desc: Restful API for managing payment links, serves a dynamic pug template each time a payment link is clicked.

Library.name: Nkolo Web
Library.desc: Invoicing application for small businesses to create and send payment links via email.

Library.name: Kombi Mobile
Library.desc: Android scheduling application with task, project and budget management functionalities.

Library.name: Kombi Web
Library.desc: Web scheduling application with task, project and budget management functionalities.

Library.name: Kombi API
Library.desc: Scheduling web services with  support for task, project and budget management.

Library.name: Zeword
Library.desc: Offline android bible application, with and in-built note taker and bookmarks manager.

Library.name: Linkout API
Library.desc: A web service for serving jobs to the Linkout web and mobile applications.

Library.name: Linkout Web
Library.desc: Linkout is a job board with a custom ATS to help you get instant feedback on the probability of your application getting to the recruiter.

Library.name: Linkout mobile
Library.desc: Linkout is a job board with a custom ATS to help you get instant feedback on the probability of your application getting to the recruiter.

Library.name: Runz
Library.desc: Realtime chat application with phone number authentication.

Library.name: chakka
Library.desc: Prototyped e-commerce application. Chakka is a hybrid app built with react native and firebase.
